title: RNN weights aren't being restored on saver.restore calls
body_html:
Environment info

##Operating System:##
Ubuntu 16.04
##Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN: ##
Cuda 8.0, CuDNN 5.1
##tensorflow version##
0.12

What other attempted solutions have you tried?

Not create the graph before using the model.

Logs or other output that would be helpful

SO question

body:
### Environment info
##Operating System:##
Ubuntu 16.04
##Installed version of CUDA and cuDNN: ##
Cuda 8.0,  CuDNN 5.1 
##tensorflow version##
0.12

### What other attempted solutions have you tried?
Not create the graph before using the model. 

### Logs or other output that would be helpful
[SO question](http://stackoverflow.com/questions/41737918/word-embeddings-change-between-sessions-even-if-saved)
